casebody.data:
DE LUCA, et al.
v.
STEIN, et al. 339A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 6, 2019 Paul Stam, Attorney at Law, Apex, R. Daniel Gibson, Attorney at Law, for The New Hanover County Board Of Education Amy O'Neal, Attorney at Law, for De Luca, Francis X., et al

Jennie Wilhelm Hauser, Special Deputy Attorney General

Mary MacLean Asbill, Attorney at Law, Brooks Rainey Pearson, Attorney at Law, Blakely E. Hildebrand, Attorney at Law, for North Carolina Coastal Federation, et al Marc Bernstein, Special Deputy Attorney General, Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitor General, Matt Burke, Solicitor General Fellow, for Stein, Josh (Attorney General) Lindsey Vance Smith, Attorney at Law, Deborah R. Stagner, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Allison Schafter, Attorney at Law, for NC School Boards Association

Allison B. Schafer, Legal Counsel/Director of Policy

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of February 2019 by Defendant and Intervenors to Reset the *65230-Day Deadline for Opening Briefs from Date of the Court's Order on this Motion:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of February 2019."
